entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
